data.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Nezuko (Advanced Demon Form) Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form) will become a playable character.
Additional content such as quotes and profile photos will also be included.

[Set Details]
・Playable character: Nezuko Kamado (Advanced Demon Form)
・Profile Photos
・Quotes

  • The main game (sold separately) is required to access this content as well as the latest patch.
  • This product is also available as part of a set. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
  • The content/specs may change without warning.

fullgame.name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD Phenom ll X6 1100T
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2GB | AMD Radeon HD 7950, 3GB
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 720p (30FPS)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2GB | AMD Radeon R9 280, 4GB
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High 1080p (30FPS), 8 GB RAM (60FPS)
